Design Choice: Explorers engage in a 2-month Explorers Journey
Helps fulfill what objectives?: Explorers learned a crap ton of practical skills (Dream%20DAO%20Explorers%20Program%20-%20Design%20Doc%20(May%202022%20057b51e4dc864f68bf9fe93bf1464d2f/Design%20Objectives%205b501b0fb6d64bab819ee55c450da97e/Explorers%20learned%20a%20crap%20ton%20of%20practical%20skills%20d4525b8d1f5f4603a6a0b5b6d8f8f083.md)

Design Choice: Explorers each create two “Learning Artifacts” (e.g. blog posts, vlogs, Learning Together Sessions) for the world—one at the midpoint of the program and one at the end
Helps fulfill what objectives?: Explorers learned a crap ton of practical skills (Dream%20DAO%20Explorers%20Program%20-%20Design%20Doc%20(May%202022%20057b51e4dc864f68bf9fe93bf1464d2f/Design%20Objectives%205b501b0fb6d64bab819ee55c450da97e/Explorers%20learned%20a%20crap%20ton%20of%20practical%20skills%20d4525b8d1f5f4603a6a0b5b6d8f8f083.md), Explorers contributed to the collective intelligence/knowledge of the Dream DAO, web3, and the world (Dream%20DAO%20Explorers%20Program%20-%20Design%20Doc%20(May%202022%20057b51e4dc864f68bf9fe93bf1464d2f/Design%20Objectives%205b501b0fb6d64bab819ee55c450da97e/Explorers%20contributed%20to%20the%20collective%20intelligen%20649dd049e4b046519bca5b4dbb8cd272.md)
Notes: Dream DAO mirror get content to show off to the world and the explorer gets a bounty for that.

Design Choice: Explorers in late April need to explain what topics + projects interest them, so they are matched with the right regen web3 orgs
Helps fulfill what objectives?: Explorers had a great, fulfilling time (Dream%20DAO%20Explorers%20Program%20-%20Design%20Doc%20(May%202022%20057b51e4dc864f68bf9fe93bf1464d2f/Design%20Objectives%205b501b0fb6d64bab819ee55c450da97e/Explorers%20had%20a%20great,%20fulfilling%20time%20082def8c2fd546a4a303ac14e50816a3.md)

Design Choice: Explorers collectively as a cohort create a capstone project that advances Dream DAO and the web3 x social impact space.
Helps fulfill what objectives?: Explorers contributed to the collective intelligence/knowledge of the Dream DAO, web3, and the world (Dream%20DAO%20Explorers%20Program%20-%20Design%20Doc%20(May%202022%20057b51e4dc864f68bf9fe93bf1464d2f/Design%20Objectives%205b501b0fb6d64bab819ee55c450da97e/Explorers%20contributed%20to%20the%20collective%20intelligen%20649dd049e4b046519bca5b4dbb8cd272.md)

Design Choice: Dream DAO recruits regen web3 orgs in April 2022
Helps fulfill what objectives?: Explorers learned a crap ton of practical skills (Dream%20DAO%20Explorers%20Program%20-%20Design%20Doc%20(May%202022%20057b51e4dc864f68bf9fe93bf1464d2f/Design%20Objectives%205b501b0fb6d64bab819ee55c450da97e/Explorers%20learned%20a%20crap%20ton%20of%20practical%20skills%20d4525b8d1f5f4603a6a0b5b6d8f8f083.md)

Design Choice: Explorers are placed in Juntos with other Explorers and some Champions, and meet every week
Helps fulfill what objectives?: Explorers had a great, fulfilling time (Dream%20DAO%20Explorers%20Program%20-%20Design%20Doc%20(May%202022%20057b51e4dc864f68bf9fe93bf1464d2f/Design%20Objectives%205b501b0fb6d64bab819ee55c450da97e/Explorers%20had%20a%20great,%20fulfilling%20time%20082def8c2fd546a4a303ac14e50816a3.md), Explorers have a place to ask "dumb" questions (Dream%20DAO%20Explorers%20Program%20-%20Design%20Doc%20(May%202022%20057b51e4dc864f68bf9fe93bf1464d2f/Design%20Objectives%205b501b0fb6d64bab819ee55c450da97e/Explorers%20have%20a%20place%20to%20ask%20dumb%20questions%2018f89031a14d4cf99f5fd7a2bdadfe01.md)

Design Choice: Explorers Journeys must be 10+ hours a week
Helps fulfill what objectives?: Explorers learned a crap ton of practical skills (Dream%20DAO%20Explorers%20Program%20-%20Design%20Doc%20(May%202022%20057b51e4dc864f68bf9fe93bf1464d2f/Design%20Objectives%205b501b0fb6d64bab819ee55c450da97e/Explorers%20learned%20a%20crap%20ton%20of%20practical%20skills%20d4525b8d1f5f4603a6a0b5b6d8f8f083.md)

Design Choice: Explorers are paid three micro-grant from Dream DAO ($500 each) if they hit the necessary milestones
